channel.title: FreeCAD on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in FreeCAD on Some Title

item.title: Freecad's memorandum (for yourself)
item.description: A memorandum for yourself. Create a primitive sphere and export with iges (specify radius and position) import FreeCAD as APP import Part freecad = APP.newDocument("model") comp_1 = Part.Sphere() comp_1.Radius=10 myPart = freecad.addObject("Part::Feature","comp_1") myPart.Shape= comp_1.toShape() myPart.Placement = App.Placement(App.Vector(100,0,0),App.Rotation(App.Vector(0,0,1),0)) freecad.recompute() myPart.Shape.MatrixOfInertia freecad.saveAs("comp_1.FCStd") Part.export([freecad.Objects[0]],"comp_1.iges")
